message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR

This paper is about image captioning, which is a problem in computer vision (CV). The paper also discusses the use of natural language processing (NLP) techniques such as part-of-speech (POS) tagging to guide caption generation, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (CL). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CV and cs.CL. 

The paper also proposes a method that uses machine learning techniques such as VAE and GAN, which are subfields of machine learning (LG) and artificial intelligence (AI). Additionally, the paper evaluates the performance of the proposed method using standard captioning metrics, which involves information retrieval (IR) techniques. Therefore, the next likely sub-categories are cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.IR.
